header.title: CosNaming_NamingContextExt

erlref.modulesummary: This interface contains operation for converting a Name sequence to a string and back.

description.p: To get access to the record definitions for the structures use:
This module also exports the functions described in:

func.name: to_string(NamingContext, Name) -> Return
func.fsummary: Stringify a Namesequence to a string

desc.p: Stringifies a Name sequence to a string.

func.name: to_name(NamingContext, NameString) -> Return
func.fsummary: Convert a stringified Nameto a Namesequence

desc.p: Converts a stringified Name to a Name sequence.

func.name: to_url(NamingContext, AddressString, NameString) -> Return
func.fsummary: Return an URL string constructed from the given Address and Name strings

desc.p: This operation takes a corbaloc string and a stringified Name sequence as input and returns a fully formed URL string.

func.name: resolve_str(NamingContext, NameString) -> Return
func.fsummary: Return the object associated, if any, with the given name string

type.v: Return = #objref | {'EXCEPTION', NamingContext::InvalidName{}} | {'EXCEPTION', NamingContext::NotFound{why, rest_of_name}} | {'EXCEPTION', NamingContext::CannotProceed{cxt, rest_of_name}}

desc.p: This operation takes a stringified Name sequence as input and returns the associated, if any, object.
